queries.nearby:
select *, haversine(latitude, longitude, cast(:latitude as real), cast(:longitude as real), 'mi') as distance_mi
from museums order by distance_mi
queries.feed:
select
  'tag:niche-museums.com,' || substr(created, 0, 11) || ':' || id as atom_id,
  name as atom_title,
  created as atom_updated,
  'https://www.niche-museums.com/browse/museums/' || id as atom_link,
  description as atom_content
from
  museums
order by
  created desc
limit
  15
queries.search:
select
  museums_fts.rank,
  museums.*
from
  museums
  join museums_fts on museums.id = museums_fts.rowid
where
  museums_fts match case
    :q
    when '' then '*'
    else :q
  end
order by
  museums_fts.rank
